service_details.title: Your End-to-End Partner in Microservices Transformation
service_details.subtitle: From architectural assessment to production-ready cloud-native deployments, Appscode helps organizations adopt microservices with minimal disruption and maximum value.

sections.title: Microservices Consulting & Strategy
sections.description: We start by deeply understanding your existing architecture, business objectives, and scalability goals to craft a clear microservices adoption roadmap.
offerings: Comprehensive evaluation of your monolithic applications to identify modularization opportunities.
Customized migration strategy aligned with your business objectives and risk tolerance.
Expert guidance on choosing the right tools, frameworks, and DevOps practices for success.

sections.title: Monolith to Microservices Migration
sections.description: Appscode engineers refactor monolithic systems into modern microservices while ensuring business continuity and performance at every stage.
offerings: Strategically decompose monoliths into microservices using domain-driven design principles.
Implement an API-first approach to ensure interoperability and scalability across services.
Leverage Kubernetes and container orchestration for seamless, cloud-native deployment.

sections.title: Microservices Integration & API Management
sections.description: Our experts ensure all your services — legacy or new — communicate efficiently through secure, scalable API integrations.
offerings: Design and implement service mesh architecture for reliable inter-service communication.
Enable robust integrations with legacy databases and external third-party systems.
Simplify your API management and observability using proven open-source frameworks.

sections.title: Microservices Support, Monitoring & Optimization
sections.description: Once live, we provide enterprise-grade maintenance, observability, and performance optimization to ensure your microservices ecosystem remains resilient and efficient.
offerings: Implement proactive monitoring with Prometheus, Grafana, and distributed tracing tools.
Conduct ongoing performance audits to reduce latency and optimize costs.
Provide 24/7 expert support for complex microservices environments in production.
